text:
e distribution of Maternal Death
Chapter 1: Status of Maternal Health in India 
and Service Delivery Framework

6
Age wise distribution of the maternal deaths show that 65% of maternal deaths are happening in the age group 
of 20 to 29 (SRS 2016-2018). The major reasons for maternal deaths are high blood pressure, post-partum 
haemorrhage, obstructed labour and abortion.
India experienced an estimated 30,000 maternal deaths in the year 2018 (HMIS division), this is a decrease of
